name: Kabuki Klash
summary: An arcade fighting game spin-off of a RPG series set in a fantasized feudal Japan. Known for its similarities with early Samurai Shodown games (including random item drops and combining attack buttons for heavier attacks), it is the only game in the entire series to get a release outside of Japan.

alternative_names.name:
Tengai Makyou Shinden
Far East of Eden: Kabuki Klash
